headline: US Embassy in Kyiv asks State Dept. to authorize departure of nonessential personnel
author: Matthew Chance *
sentences: A State Department spokesperson said they have "nothing to announce at this time," adding, "We conduct rigorous contingency planning, as we always do, in the event the security situation deteriorates."
The US Embassy in Kyiv has requested that the State Department authorize the departure of all nonessential staff and their families, according to multiple sources familiar with the matter.
A source close to the Ukrainian government told CNN that the US has informed Ukraine that it is "likely to start evacuations as early as next week"
A spokesperson for the embassy declined to confirm and referred CNN to the State Department in Washington.
